pilots.name: Lieutenant Karsabi
pilots.caption: Brash Noble
pilots.ability: After you gain a disarm token, if you are not stressed, you may gain 1 stress token to remove 1 disarm token.

pilots.name: Major Vynder
pilots.caption: Pragmatic Survivor
pilots.ability: While you defend, if you are disarmed, roll 1 additional defense die.

pilots.name: Nu Squadron Pilot
pilots.text: With a design inspired by other Cygnus Spaceworks vessels, the Alpha-class star wing is a versatile craft assigned to Imperial Navy specialist units that need a starfighter they can outfit for multiple roles.

pilots.name: Rho Squadron Pilot
pilots.text: The elite pilots of Rho Squadron instill terror in the Rebellion, using both the Xg-1 assault configuration and Os-1 arsenal loadout of the Alpha-class star wing to devastating effect.
